message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 60/40 split seems reasonable for us to settle this quickly.
Your offer was a bit too lopsided, Alice. Let's split things closer to the middle. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  It's a fair offer considering the time pressure.
Bob, time is ticking and we both lose if this drags on.  I'll come down a bit to 58/42 - it's more than fair considering I made the first move.
Alice, we're getting close, but your sense of fairness seems a bit off. I'm proposing 52/48.  It's a reasonable compromise, and we need to settle this before inflation eats away at the value.
Bob, let's be realistic.  We're running out of time. 55/45 is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
